api.register_error: There was a problem completing your registration.
api.verify_error: Your code was was not verified. Make sure you have entered it into your Habbo motto.
landing.success.body: Thank you for registering to HabboConnect.com - Please follow our Twitter account to keep up with all the latest news regarding our coming release @hbcfansite

Habboconnect aims to change the way we use and play Habbo on a global scale, putting the user back in control by offering them a diverse collection of tools to engage with Habbo in unique and creative ways.

Whilst we work hard on delivering the next generation Habbo fansite we would appreciate any support we can get, we’ve created a patreon where Habbos can chip in and show their support for the site. Supporting the site costs just £1 early access and you’ll get a special recognition badge on our site when released and early previews of the site. In addition to this, each month you stay subscribed you will have 1 extra ticket towards our 530 Credit and 1,000 Diamond giveaway worth £40
landing.success.title: Successful Registration
